Promise.all(vaccList.map((vaccCenter) => getVaccCenterLatLong(vaccCenter))); } const panTo = useCallback( ({lat, lng}) => { mapRef.current.panTo({lat, lng}); mapRef.current.setZoom(14); }, [], ) const getVaccCenterLatLong = useCallback(async (vaccCenter) => { const address = vaccCenter.address + " " + vaccCenter.city + ", " + vaccCenter.state + " " + vaccCenter.zipcode; try { const {lat, lng} = await getLatLngFromAddress(address); return {...vaccCenter, lat, lng}; } catch(error) { console.log("error getting latlong for vaccenter " + vaccCenter.id); } }, []) const getLatLngFromAddress = useCallback(async (address) => { try { const results = await getGeocode({address}); const { lat, lng } = await getLatLng(results[0]); return ({lat, lng}) } catch(error) { console.log("error1"); } }, []); if (loadError) return "Error loading maps"; if (!isLoaded) return "Loading maps"; return (
{markers.map((marker, i) => { setSelected(marker); }} /> )} {selected ? ( setSelected(null)}>

{selected.name}

2nd Dose: {selected.doubleDoses}

) : null}
) } export default App;
